summary: Complete hospital management application with role-based access (Patient/Doctor/Admin), AI-powered medical report analysis and symptom assessment (Vitals AI), doctor allocation system, emergency SOS, and minimalistic Flipkart-inspired UI design. Includes registration systems for doctors and admins.
architectural_notes: App must be production-ready, not a prototype
All features must work without requiring repeated republishing
Application is a hospital management system with case tracking and department-based doctor assignment
Admin dashboard must display all processing cases with addresses and user data
Emergency SOS must route to specific medical departments based on user selection
UI design should be minimalistic and clean like Flipkart - avoid large images, use normal-sized elements
Home page must provide clear role selection (Patient/Doctor/Admin) before accessing specific portals
Integrate AI capabilities for medical report analysis and symptom assessment
All three user roles (Patient, Doctor, Admin) must work simultaneously without conflicts
Platform AI system is branded as 'Vitals AI'
known_issues: Current app features not working properly
Toggle features not working in original application
Sign-in functionality not working in original application

existing_features.title: Audit and fix all non-functional features in the existing application to ensure complete functionality
Ensure frontend properly integrates with backend actor and handles all API calls with appropriate error handling
Implement comprehensive admin authentication system that allows authorized admins to log in using Internet Identity and access administrative dashboard features

Create admin dashboard that displays all processing cases with complete details including patient information, addresses, assigned doctors, case status, department assignments, and timestamps for case creation and updates
Create admin view for managing doctors organized by department, showing which doctors are assigned to which cases, their department specializations, and current case loads

Enhance Emergency SOS feature to include a department selection dropdown that allows users to specify which type of medical department should handle their emergency case (Emergency, Cardiology, Neurology, Pediatrics, Orthopedics, General Medicine, etc.)

Replace current blockchain-focused UI with a hospital management interface that includes: user-facing Emergency SOS submission form with department selection, patient registration, case status tracking, and admin dashboard for managing all cases and doctor assignments
Ensure all UI components are fully functional with working toggle features, sign-in functionality, form submissions, and data fetching with proper error handling and loading states
Create a home page with role selection interface that allows users to choose their role (Patient, Doctor, or Admin) before accessing their respective portal sections
Create AI symptom checker that allows patients to write their symptoms in natural language and receive suggestions about potential conditions they may be suffering from
Redesign entire UI to follow Flipkart-inspired minimalistic design aesthetic with clean, neat interface using normal-sized elements instead of large photos, making it attractive yet efficient
Ensure all AI features (medical report analysis and symptom checker) work simultaneously without blocking or interfering with other system operations including doctor allocation and Emergency SOS
Integrate all existing functional features (doctor allocation, Emergency SOS, case management, admin dashboard) with the new AI capabilities and role-based portal system
Add registration functionality for admins to add themselves to the platform, allowing authenticated users to register as admins through the admin portal interface
Add registration functionality for doctors to add themselves to the platform, allowing authenticated users to register as doctors with department selection through the doctor portal interface
Update the home page role selector to display 'Vitals AI' as the primary branding name for the AI system throughout the interface
Add a 'Get Started' call-to-action button below the Vitals AI branding on the home page that guides users to select their role
Add a brief introductory section on the home page that explains the Vitals AI platform's purpose and capabilities, positioned above or near the role selection interface

Change the primary UI color scheme from light blue to a greenish-blue teal color (similar to the reference link previously provided), updating all color variables in the Tailwind configuration and CSS files to use the new color palette throughout the application

Update the card component borders to use the new greenish-blue teal color with a flashy/prominent appearance, ensuring the border styling is applied to all card elements including role selector cards, dashboard cards, and portal interface cards
Refine the UI spacing and layout throughout the application to create a professional, minimalistic, and attractive appearance with proper padding, margins, and whitespace between elements

Verify that all existing functionality (authentication, portal navigation, emergency SOS, symptom checker, medical report analysis, admin/doctor dashboards, case management, and doctor management) continues to work correctly after the UI color and spacing changes

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify and fix backend actor methods to ensure they handle all calls correctly and return expected responses
Test and verify application works correctly after deployment without requiring repeated republishing
Restore exact UI and functionality from original application (https://similar-beige-1ry-draft.caffeine.xyz/)
Add comprehensive admin login system to view/manage all processing cases, addresses, user data, and doctors organized by department
Enhanced Emergency SOS feature with department type selection for routing cases to appropriate medical departments

Replace the current blockchain-focused backend data model with a hospital management data model that includes: Patient records with personal information and addresses, Emergency cases with status tracking (pending/processing/completed), Doctor profiles with assigned department information, Case assignments linking doctors to emergency cases, and Department categorizations for medical specialties

Implement backend API methods for creating emergency cases, assigning doctors to cases, updating case status, retrieving all cases for admin view, and managing doctor-case assignments with proper authentication checks
Implement AI-powered medical report analysis that can read patient reports and detect severity levels
Create AI symptom checker that allows patients to write their symptoms and receive suggestions about potential conditions
Design minimalistic Flipkart-inspired UI with clean, neat design using normal-sized elements instead of large photos - attractive yet efficient
Create home page with role selection interface allowing users to choose Patient, Doctor, or Admin role before accessing their respective portals
Implement AI-powered medical report analysis feature that can read patient medical reports and automatically detect severity levels of conditions
Add registration system for admins and doctors to add themselves to the platform
Update home page to display 'Vitals AI' as the AI system name with 'Get Started' button and brief introduction about the platform
Change UI color scheme from blue to greenish-blue teal with matching card borders, ensure professional minimalistic look with proper spacing

projectName: Republish app with all features fully functional
